body_html:
Interesting, when I run locally, it prints the “requesting stop” message, runs eval/export but then train_and_evaluate just continues training. I assumed this is because of the “while True” in the run_local method.

To be clear, I’m using TF 1.9, and copied that early stopping hook code directly (since it’s not releasing until 1.10).

body:
Interesting, when I run locally, it prints the “requesting stop” message, runs eval/export but then train_and_evaluate just continues training. I assumed this is because of the “while True” in the run_local method.

To be clear, I’m using TF 1.9, and copied that early stopping hook code directly (since it’s not releasing until 1.10).
